text: Ara uta theke duto o garu theke duto. Balo -- ''tini ki nisedha karechena nara duti athaba madi duti, na madi-dutira garbha ya dharana kareche ta? Athaba tomara ki saksi chile yakhana allah tomadera jan'ya e'i bidhana diyechilena?’’ Sutaram ke besi an'yayakari tara ca'ite ye allah‌ra birud'dhe mithya racana kare, yena se lokake bibhranta karate pare jnanahinabhabe? Nihsandeha allah dharmapathe paricalita karena na an'yayakari lokadera.
